entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
